name: Beek - Familiar Spirit
description:
A call for help within a mysterious messaging app. Someone lost and wondering through a forest in a faraway place. And their destiny in your hands.

Beek: How I Became a Familiar Spirit and Everything After That is a text-based narrative experience from the creators of Nekojishi. Featuring dozens of branching paths, multiple endings, and CG's to unlock!

Help Beek seek a way home, and face the darkness of this world with strength and courage.

Beek - Familiar Spirit is playable in English. Traditional Chinese (繁体中文), Simplified Chinese (简体中文), Japanese (日本語), German (Deutsch), and French (Français).

Find us on Patreon if you want to help support our future work!

Note:

  • Beek - Familiar Spirit is available for free to download from the App Store and Google Play, however the version available here is DRM-free and includes the purchasable CG pack.
  • This game was designed for mobile devices and we recommend you play on one for the best experience. We've made a PC version available for accessibility with some functionality unlocked from the start which should make playing on PC a more pleasant experience.
